title: Beautiful 2x2 townhome with attached garage! Tours available!
posting_body: ['Parkway Townhomes', '2675 Windmill Pkwy, Henderson, NV, 89074', 'More unit details at:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 66', 'OR Text', '66', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'Parkway Townhomes in Henderson, NV', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1034 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Located in the South Green Valley neighborhood of Henderson, Nevada, Parkway Townhomes offers two and three bedroom apartment homes.', 'Each home includes an attached garage, full-size washer and dryer, and hardwood-style flooring.', 'Select units are newly renovated, featuring granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances and custom cabinetry.', 'Parkway Townhomes offers an exclusive style of neighborhood living.', 'In the center of our private community, you will find a resort-style swimming pool with lounge areas, a gas BBQ and ample seating.', 'Residents have 24 hour access to our fitness center, dog park and Pittman Wash Trail located at the south gate of the community.', 'Zoned for Clark County School District, you can enjoy the convenience of having Aggie Roberts Elementary School just across the street.', 'Parkway Townhomes is also located just minutes from The District at Green Valley Ranch, McCarran Airport, and Town Square, I-215 and U.S. Route 95.Parkway Townhomes- relaxed, suburban apartment living that we know as the real Las Vegas experience.', 'Features', '- Online Maintenance Requests', '- Walk', 'In Closets', '- Professional Management', '- Full size washer/dryer connections', '- Flexible Lease Terms Available', 'Community Amenities', '- Playgrounds', '- Boat Parking', '- 24-hour fitness center', '- Resort Style Pool and Spa with Water Fall', '- Bark Park', '- Pool side misters', '- Online Payments Accepted', '- 24-hr Maintenance', '- Gated Access', '- Wi-Fi access available in all units and public spaces', '- Beautifully Landscaped Gardens', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday: 8:30AM-5:30PM', 'Saturday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Dogs and domestic cats are allowed, pending approval by management, not aggressive breeds.', 'Dogs must not act aggressive at any time or bark excessively.', 'Dogs must be "apartment friendly" a maximum of two pets is allowed per apartment.', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'Le91TgO9V']
